titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the National Parks Conservation Association.
A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the National Parks Conservation Association.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
This resolution commemorates the 100th anniversary of the founding of the National Parks Conservation Association.
The resolution also applauds the association for its past, present, and future efforts to advocate for the National Park System.
Finally, it wishes the association continued success during the next 100 years as it strives to engage and inspire the public to advance the mission of the National Park System.
